title: How to Make Buffalo Popcorn

steps.headline: Place the popcorn in a large bowl.
Cover a baking tray with waxed or parchment paper.
Preheat the oven to 275° Fahrenheit or 135° Celsius.
Melt the butter and buffalo sauce in the microwave.
steps.description: Pour the two ingredients in a microwave-safe bowl and heat until fully melted, taking about 15-30 seconds.

steps.headline: Pour the buffalo sauce mixture over the popcorn.
Toss the popcorn around with your hands until fully coated.
Spread the popcorn over the baking tray.
Bake the popcorn for about twenty minutes.
steps.description: Every few minutes, shake the baking tray around while the popcorn bakes.

steps.headline: Season the popcorn with a desired amount of salt.
Serve.
steps.description: Pour the popcorn in a large serving bowl. Enjoy!

text: Place the popcorn in a large bowl.  Cover a baking tray with waxed or parchment paper.  Preheat the oven to 275° Fahrenheit or 135° Celsius.  Melt the butter and buffalo sauce in the microwave. Pour the two ingredients in a microwave-safe bowl and heat until fully melted, taking about 15-30 seconds. Pour the buffalo sauce mixture over the popcorn.  Toss the popcorn around with your hands until fully coated.  Spread the popcorn over the baking tray.  Bake the popcorn for about twenty minutes. Every few minutes, shake the baking tray around while the popcorn bakes. Season the popcorn with a desired amount of salt.  Serve. Pour the popcorn in a large serving bowl. Enjoy!
